name: obsidian-koreader-sync
description: Sync highlights and bookmarks from KOReader with improved handling and organization.

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && pnpm run copy-files
scripts.copy-files: mkdir -p dist && cp manifest.json dist/ && cp styles.css dist/
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && pnpm run build && git add manifest.json versions.json dist/
scripts.release: pnpm run build && cd dist && tar -czf ../koreader-sync-plugin.tar.gz .
